Then, we'll take a nostalgic look at where many fell in love with heavy machinery, TONKA TRUCKS! Plus, we get the inside scoop on massive mining machines that can skim mere inches or scour literal truckloads of material at a time

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs - EP 2
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Mantanan Sama Gue Mantenan Sama Dia, Chuaks
programme.desc: Tasya and Suji met in the park when they were both dumped by their boyfriends at the same time. The two became closer when Tasya asked Suji to pretend to be her boyfriend so that her ex would be jealous of her. Because they spent so much time together, their relationship became serious.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 467
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: GALAU? CINCAU DULU LAAH…
programme.desc: Armed with a photo, Ridho Ilahi was asked to find his grandfather's missing granddaughter. He accidentally met Angelica Simperler, who looked just like the photo. In the end, he was told to pretend to be his grandfather's granddaughter. Would anyone find out?

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 142
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: GODFATHER OF KOLANG KALING
programme.desc: Faris, who was speeding, almost hit a girl named Putri, the daughter of a palm fruit supplier. Their first encounter was marked by conflict. However, things changed when they needed each other for business. Faris's mother, who needed a palm fruit supplier, had to choose Putri as her supplier. Since then, the two have had to meet regularly to keep their business running smoothly.

It's not just about business, but also about finding a partner.

programme.title: Sorry, Sengaja! - EP 10
programme.desc: Rancangan "prank" yang berlaku di pejabat Astro, melibatkan pekerja-pekerja yang selalunya tidak menjangka akan sesuatu berlaku. Rancangan ini dikepalai oleh beberapa "prankster" dari Thinker Studios.

programme.title: Ek Eleh! Afdlin! Afdlin - EP 9
programme.desc: Program wawancara yang memaparkan sketsa, permainan selebriti dan pentas lawak Dato' Afdlin Shauki.

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 3
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin & Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: Pecah Perut - EP 5
programme.desc: Sebuah program sketsa komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak dan pelakon popular seperti Kamal Adli, Sherry Al-Hadad, Shahrul Shiro, Mamak Puteh dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2023 - EP 1
programme.desc: Jep, Rahim, Pak Ya dan Ebby Yus kembali menghiburkan anda dengan musim terbaru bersama tetamu selebriti jemputan dan cameo yang mengejutkan pada setiap minggu!

programme.title: Dr. Pontianak S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang unik di mana entiti menjadi tumpuan utama! Mengkaji mitos dan memecahkan stigma sosial tentang alam ghaib sambil memberi anda gambaran tentang dunia mereka.

programme.title: Jejak Jepun - EP 5
programme.desc: Ikuti kembara Zizan Razak ke seluruh Jepun, menyelami keunikan budaya serta melawati destinasi-destinasi yang menarik.

programme.title: Perang Periuk - EP 2
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang unik di mana ibu mentua akan bertarung dengan menantu perempuan untuk memenangi hati juri-juri dan orang yang tersayang dengan masakan mereka.

programme.title: Sepenggal Puisi - EP 4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang konflik 2 buah keluarga, satu di Yogyakarta dan satu di Kuala Lumpur. Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun terbongkar apabila Fariz ke Yogyakarta untuk mendapatkan kepastian.

programme.title: Tikam - EP 4
programme.desc: NJ, Akma, Ed, Ika, Mike dan Sap menjumpai mayat Shahrol, mati bunuh diri di pejabat. Rupanya kegiatan pecah amanah mereka telah bocor dan di antara mereka adalah pengkhianat.

programme.title: Roda Panas - EP 1
programme.desc: Trend terkini kereta atau motosikal mengenai enjin, roda dan aktiviti yang berkaitan dengan dunia automotif.

programme.title: Celup - EP 6
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: RIAlisasi Job Selebriti - EP 7
programme.desc: Penonton berpeluang menyaksikan selebriti kesayangan mereka melakukan kerja yang tidak berkaitan dengan karier asalnya.

programme.title: Kontena Ana
programme.desc: Berlatarbelakangkan tahun 2001, di mana perceraian melalui sms berlaku kepada Ana dan Ana bertekad untuk membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Tai Tai Berkecai - EP 1
programme.desc: Azlan Martins dikenali sebagai lelaki yang paling dihormati di negara ini. The Martins Ladies, isterinya, dan dua anak perempuan terkenal dengan gaya hidup mewah mereka.

programme.title: Gadis Kosmos
programme.desc: Trilogi Kekasih Elektrik dan Aku, Mawar & Makhluk Asing di mana Bart dan Amri berada di fasa perpisahan dengan pasangan mereka. Seorang wanita cantik muncul mengisi hati kecewa mereka.

programme.title: Catch and Cook - EP 1
programme.desc: Dalam Catch and Cook, Hairul Azreeen dan Theeban menyoroti lokasi indah di sekitar Malaysia dengan satu misi, iaitu untuk menangkap ikan di tempat itu dan memasaknya dengan bantuan tetamu chef selebriti.

programme.title: Travel Like Local x Aussie - EP 3
programme.desc: Setiap minggu dua selebriti akan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik dan unik di sekitar Australia.

programme.title: Hala 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Mengembara ke tempat-tempat menarik di Malaysia bersama Remy Ishak dengan menaiki motosikalnya.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap The Series - EP 10
programme.desc: Nini dan Haikal iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Impiana - EP 10
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang berkonsepkan tentang "make over" bahagian di dalam rumah bagi memenuhi citarasa pemilik rumah.

programme.title: Kembara Chef Wan S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Datuk Chef Wan akan meroka Kota Istanbul iaitu Sultanahmet, Beyoglu, dan Taksim. Kesemuanya dikelilingi oleh restoran, makanan jalanan dan seni bina hebat.

programme.desc: Eyras rasa Adellia perlu tahu tentang status dirinya yang kini mengandung. Aziz mahu Arif kembali semula kepada keluarga. Adellia termakan hasutan orang dan mula kembali berasa sangsi

programme.title: Karok La Kau! - EP 9

programme.title: Eat Clean With Anis - EP 4
programme.desc: Dalam kehidupan yang sentiasa sibuk, kita punya masa yang singkat untuk menyediakan makanan. Tiada yang lebih sempurna jika kita dapat menyediakan hidangan yang pantas, sihat, seimbang serta berkhasiat.

programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Chinraasu, a compassionate villager loved by the whole village, and Thulasi, a cheerful young girl, are siblings who can go to any lengths for each other. Follow this unique story about the bonds shared by Chinraasu and Thulasi as they stand by each other while finding love and joy in the trials of life.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: Le Vieux Fusil
programme.desc: 1944. Julien Dandieu, a surgeon from Montauban, decides to send his wife and daughter to the country and greater safety. A few days later he discovers that the entire population of the village has been massacred by the Germans. Mad with grief, he sets out to hunt down those responsible.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A man swims in the sea. As he advances, memories come flooding back. From early childhood to his adult life, all his memories are connected to water. Some are happy, others glorious or even traumatic...

programme.title: Climat : Des Resistants En Outre-Mer
programme.desc: The overseas territories are home to 90% of France's biodiversity: an invaluable heritage now at risk. From Reunion to the Polynesian islands, from Guiana to the Antilles, local people are raising the alarm and joining forces to propose innovative solutions. A close-up look at this environmental vanguard.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver - EP 4
programme.desc: Easter is one of the busiest periods for the Swiss mountain huts. At the Zapport, there's been no heavy snowfall this year. In the Bernese Highlands, at the Tierbergli refuge, the season is at its height.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 22
programme.desc: From Reunion to the West Indies, via French Guiana and Mayotte, France's overseas territories represent a major geopolitical asset for the country. But economic, social and demographic vulnerabilities are exacerbating local tensions and inequalities with France. A closer look at a complex and contrasting situation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 1
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 14
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 31
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 1
programme.desc: The High Priestess decides to send Pokou to the Bali Komians to undergo seven challenges. King Ossei Toutou sets off to fight the Denkyra who want to invade Kumassi.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 2
programme.desc: On their way to Bali, Aunt Amlan and Pokou are attacked by enemy Komians. The High Priestess informs the members of the council that Kumassi is in danger.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 4
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Amiens
programme.desc: On a canal amidst the ''hortillonnages'', the floating market gardens of Amiens, a lifeless body is found in a Nautilus-shaped fun-fair gondola. Inspector Monet and his assistant Barnier head the investigation. The victim, a seemingly ordinary woman, was apparently threatened ambitious plans for a Jules Verne theme park.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 24
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Les Ames Perdues
programme.desc: 2014. ''Caesar'', a former forensic photographer working for the Damascus police, reveals thousands of photographs of victims of the Syrian regime, tortured to death. The pictures led to arrest warrants being issued for some of the leading figures of the Bashar al-Assad administration, for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Treizor
programme.desc: A father and his son have an appointment with a psychiatrist to try to understand the young man's OCD behaviour and rituals that all revolve around the number 13.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 11
programme.desc: A few days before moving, Stephanie is busy with the final preparations. Cynthia is becoming attached to little Alex and decides to get more involved with the youngsters of the Child Protection Service. Meanwhile, Stephanie forgets a promise she'd made to her friend. Furious, Cynthia is out for revenge.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 12
programme.desc: Following the threats made by Cynthia, Martin is forced to assume his responsibilities. Stephanie's world collapses. She turns to Cynthia for comfort, but the latter is avoiding her.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 13
programme.desc: Stephanie tries to get over the challenges she's had to face during the last few weeks. Cynthia does all she can to repair the damage done to their friendship and Juliette wonders about her parents' shared custody.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 2
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 15
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 32
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 3
programme.desc: Several Komians are busy around a large cauldron closely supervised by the High Priestess. Pokou manages to escape with the young boy who had set the trap for the Komian, before saving her.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 4
programme.desc: The Komian finds Pokou and N'zi. She hurls a fireball towards the children but someone responds with an even more powerful ball of light.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 5
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1688
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Riviere
programme.desc: Mountain streams flow between the Pyrenees and the Atlantic. These powerful rivers are drained by corn fields and many barrages disrupt the water cycle and its biodiversity. A close look at beauty and disaster.

programme.title: Sauvage
programme.desc: 2043. The Mediterranean Sea. Melissa, accompanied by her dog, works on the ''Rainbow'', her connected yacht. The young woman sells the plastic she collects to the global recycling exchange. One day she saves a little monkey from drowning. An encounter that changes her life.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 3
programme.desc: Accused by several women of infecting them with HIV, Nicolas asks the law firm to defend him. Meanwhile, Paule is horrified to discover that Irene has handed over the care of her son to Simon's mother. Particularly as the latter's confused state means she mistakes him for her own son.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 4
programme.desc: Paule becomes Simon's surrogate mother. Warnier profits from the situation to tell his dying mother that he intends to marry Paule and adopt Simon. Meanwhile, Paule takes on the defence of a young police officer accused of committing a tragic error during a raid in an inner-city housing estate.

programme.title: Movie - Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham
programme.desc: Sakthi befriends Vaanathi while travelling to his village to sell his ancestor's property. Little does he know that her father has been waiting for him to seek revenge for more than two decades.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Aadikkam
programme.desc: Pandian is a cop who exploits Naga, a thug. When Naga finds out that Pandian raped a reporter, he changes his ways. Meanwhile, Pandian frames Guru for a murder so that he can marry his lover Priya.

programme.title: Movie - Eesa
programme.desc: The story revolves around the lives of saltpan workers. One of the workers decides to revolt against his employers when his family is destroyed due to their oppressive and cruel ways.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Mitta Mirasu
programme.desc: Chellaiya is at loggerheads with his uncle Masilamani and his two sons for backstabbing his father. Things take a turn when Chellaiya's brother and his wife grow closer to their uncle's family.

programme.title: Movie - Karuppasamy Kuthagaitharar
programme.desc: Life goes on for the protagonist until Meenakshi stumbles into his life. An aspiring medical student, she relates Karan's benevolence to her late mother's. Soon after, they both become victim of the stupid cupid's bait.

programme.title: Movie - Soorasamharam
programme.desc: Pandian, a police officer, sets out to take revenge on a drug lord for the murder of his best friend Arun. However, Pandian gets abducted by the criminal and is forced into drug addiction.

programme.title: Movie - Ragasiya Police
programme.desc: Surya, a police officer, is removed from a criminal case when he is on the verge of tracing the culprit. However when it is handed to his friend, he gets killed and Surya sets out to catch the killer.

programme.title: Movie - Samy
programme.desc: A policeman accepts bribes from corrupt politicians and local thugs to help them in their illegal work. However, he decides to correct his mistakes after he falls in love with a woman.

programme.title: Movie - Ammavin Kai Pesi
programme.desc: After being accused of theft, Annamalai leaves his house. His mother Ranganayaki desperately tries contacting him using a cell phone in order to ask him to return to save their house.

programme.title: Movie - Malarinum Melliya
programme.desc: Pannayar loves his village like his own family and is highly respected in society. When his son falls for the daughter of the local temple priest, his status comes in the way of agreeing to the match.

programme.title: Movie - Murattu Kaathal
programme.desc: Merlin is a pop star who meets Ramesh in a park. After a few events, she realises that he's an unhinged stalker. The reason for his behaviour is linked to his traumatic past and a song sung by Merlin.

programme.title: Movie - Aalukkoru Asai (New)
programme.desc: Arivalagan plans on leading a happy life by marrying an independent, educated girl. However, his life turns upside down when his orthodox grandparents force him to marry an illiterate woman.

programme.title: Movie - Thaaye Neeye Thunai

programme.title: Movie - Priya
programme.desc: A leading film actress is controlled by her producer who even refuses to let her get married. Therefore, she seeks the help of a lawyer to get rid of her producer.

programme.title: Movie - Ragalai
programme.desc: Raj leads a carefree life and makes money by betting. When he desperately needs money to treat his father, he agrees to a bet of wooing Chaitra for a large sum. But then he learns a startling fact.

programme.title: ASO Miscellaneous Programming 2025
programme.desc: The One Water Race is a professional race and created for the absolute best endurance racers in the world. The race distance is about 250 km, a distance of 6 marathons, split up into approximately 200 km running and 50 km swimming. Running takes place on all types of terrain, rocks, cliffs, gravel roads, paths but mostly unpaved and difficult terrain. Swimming is in open sea and can often feature strong winds, currents and waves.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: Ray Parlour joins Will Perry in the changing room to reveal his 10 favourite Premier League moments. A must-watch for any Arsenal fan and football fan alike, packed full of stories about the club's greatest players, and of course that Invincible winning season.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2011/2012 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 20
programme.desc: Manchester City v QPR on the final day of the 2011/12 season will forever be remembered as the most dramatic of finales to a Premier League season. Shaun Wright-Phillips and Joleon Lescott offer the perspective from both sides, with the final day drama at the Etihad set in the context of Manchester City's Run-In and their pursuit of a first Premier League Title.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: An evergreen strand that relives classic matches, seasons and moments in the company of those who starred in them.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 3
programme.desc: No Australian has made more Premier League appearances than Mark Schwarzer, so who better to decide on the true Australian GOAT from those who have made the journey from Down Under to the Premier League.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 13
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 09 NOV
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 11, kicking off with Spurs versus Man United, West Ham host Burnley, and for the game of the weekend in Man City's head to head clash with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2008/2009 season.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 14
programme.desc: Arsenal legend and Invincible, Robert Pires looks back on his greatest Premier League moments, counting down his top 10 from his unforgettable career in England. From stunning goals to title-winning performances, Pires reflects on the moments that defined his time in the league, sharing personal insights and behind the scenes stories along the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the best teams in Premier League history, we speak to the players who formed part of the Arsenal Invincibles of the 2003-04 season and hear about the behind the scenes stories and funny anecdotes from that unforgettable league win. With contributions from Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, Dennis Bergkamp, Freddie Ljungberg, Ray Parlour and Martin Keown.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 19
programme.desc: Still the only team in Premier League history to throw away a 12-point lead, Les Ferdinand tells the story of Newcastle's agonising Run-In, where Kevin Keegan's side were pipped to the title by Manchester United.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 4
programme.desc: Marcelo Bielsa brought Premier League football back to Leeds in 2020, following a 16 year exile from the top flight. Amidst the backdrop of a global pandemic, Bielsa's full-throttle tactics made Leeds the story of the season. Stuart Dallas recalls the highlights.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2020/2021 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: From his family fish stall in the markets of Cuiaba, Brazil to the Premier League - still just 24 years old, Igor Jesus' footballing journey has already taken him to three continents. In this week's Big Interview, we catch up with the Cuiaba native on the banks of Hawton Waters in Nottinghamshire to discuss his youth and rise through the ranks in Brazil, his move to Saudi Arabia before returning to Brazil to lift the Copa Libertadores and now, life in the Premier League with Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2017/2018 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2017/2018 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: In 2024/25, AFC Bournemouth smashed their club record with 56 Premier League points, but less than 20 years earlier, they were drowning in debt and fighting for survival. This is the story of a club that defied the odds, silenced the doubters, and rose to become a certified Premier League contender, with their eyes set on Europe.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 7
programme.desc: Matt Richie and Charlie Daniels are the guests for a special edition of PL Moments which discusses Bournemouth's rise from administration to the Premier League.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: From his family fish stall in the markets of Cuiaba, Brazil to the Premier League - still just 24 years old, Igor Jesus' footballing journey has already taken him to three continents. In this week's Big Interview, we catch up with the Cuiaba native on the banks of Hawton Waters in Nottinghamshire to discuss his youth and rise through the ranks in Brazil, his move to Saudi Arabia before returning to Brazil to lift the Copa Libertadores and now, life in the Premier League with Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: With 208 goals in 491 top flight appearances, Wayne Rooney is widely regarded as one of the best strikers to have played in the League. We sit down with the Englishman to discuss the moments that made him a legend and helped him rightly earn his place in the Premier League Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: With 481 Premier League appearances and five titles - Michael Carrick is a Premier League icon. Carrick sits down with Premier League Moments to look back over his glittering career - from the West Ham youth academy through to being a key figure in Sir Alex's Ferguson's Manchester United side. In addition to his Premier League career, he also reflects on winning the Champions League, Europa League, the FA Cup as well as his international career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 11
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.desc: Netbusters provides an alternative look at the weekends matches - all of the goals, key saves, misses and tackles in a fun, fast-paced 26 minutes.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 11
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest striker the Premier League has ever seen, Thierry Henry sits down with Will Perry to reveal his Top 10 Premier League Moments.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the best teams in Premier League history, we speak to the players who formed part of the Arsenal Invincibles of the 2003-04 season and hear about the behind the scenes stories and funny anecdotes from that unforgettable league win. With contributions from Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, Dennis Bergkamp, Freddie Ljungberg, Ray Parlour and Martin Keown.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 09 NOV
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 11, kicking off with Spurs versus Man United, West Ham host Burnley, and for the game of the weekend in Man City's head to head clash with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest striker the Premier League has ever seen, Thierry Henry sits down with Will Perry to reveal his Top 10 Premier League Moments.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: We follow the rise of one of Italy's most gifted midfielders and his journey to Premier League stardom at Newcastle United, Sandro Tonali. From his early days at Brescia, where his talent drew comparisons to Italian greats, to his development at AC Milan and eventual move to St. James' Park, we trace Tonali's evolution on and off the pitch.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2018/2019 season.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 19
programme.desc: Still the only team in Premier League history to throw away a 12-point lead, Les Ferdinand tells the story of Newcastle's agonising Run-In, where Kevin Keegan's side were pipped to the title by Manchester United.

programme.title: FS MMA David Balzer vs. Joel Liddacoat
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Joel Liddacoat comes face to face with David Balzer in a brutal scrap in front of fight fans at the CN Centre in British Columbia, Canada.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Lovemore N'Dou vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features 'The Black Panther', Lovemore N'dou, (45-8, 30 KOs) defending his IBF Junior Welterweight Title against an upstart Paul 'Magic Man' Malignaggi (22-1, 5 KOs) on June 16, 2007 at the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, Connecticut, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Tyson Fury vs. Steve Cunningham
programme.desc: This episode features a Heavyweight bout between the unpredictable and unbeaten Tyson Fury as we works his way up the ranks taking on former champ Steve Cunningham, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Canelo Alvarez vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Canelo Alvarez taking on Kermit Cintron in a bout that helped elevate Alvarez into the light middleweight title picture and take another step towards becoming one of the biggest names in boxing. Also on the card, action from a classic battle between Joel Casamayor and Michael Katsidis for the WBO Lightweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Hakuho, Yutakayama, Kotoshogiku and Abi from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels haven't been making good choices round the messy clubhouse. With Duggee's help, they start to get it right. But not before sending Roly's imagination into overdrive!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 14
programme.desc: Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 33
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 34
programme.desc: Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 35
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 107
programme.desc: Big straws appear in Teletubbyland and Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po wonder what to do with them. The Teletubbies blow through the straws to make colourful bubbles.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper find a Poppletoise on the beach. But when the Poppletoise's eggs start to hatch while she's away, can the friends find her in time?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: While trying to solve a puzzle, Dog and Pug end up looking for a Minotaur in an ancient maze. After a number of false turns, they reach the centre and find the friendly Minotaur.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Snowden has lost his pine cone ears. Will Messy and his chums find them in time for his performance in the OKIDO Ice Skating Extravaganza?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: OKIDO's biggest robot Stan Tall has no sense of touch and is longing to feel the snow and the wind on his face. Will Messy and his friends be able to help?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Monty discovers Jimmy Jones is sad and tries to cheer him up, but wonders why everyone can't be happy all the time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: JoJo's excited to go on her first camping trip with Gran Gran, Cousin Lexi and Uncle Tyrell. It'll be JoJo's first time sleeping outside, and there's lots to find out about camping.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran set off on a trail to find street art. Charlene is working on a special surprise for the end, and JoJo and Gran Gran tell everyone to make sure they see it.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 27
programme.desc: Sarah's Tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 7
programme.desc: While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 31
programme.desc: It's time for Bluey and Bingo to get out of the bath. But Dad has decided not to tell them what to do and gets roped into a game of Burger Shop.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Supertato invites Evil Pea to his sleepover, but Carrot is suspicious and vows to stay up all night to make sure she can't unleash any of her evil plans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 43
programme.desc: Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon with whisperings that someone is going on an adventure!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 44
programme.desc: The squirrels go to see what Duggee is doing but on the way Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better? Happy's mum says laughter is the best medicine.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Jake is cooking traditional Australian meat pies.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 15
programme.desc: The pirates accidentally miss the postal delivery of Captain Captain's favourite magazine Perfectly Pirate and try to trick her into thinking she has already received it.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Everyone hears music playing. They follow the sound and see Lily practicing ballet.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Prickly Pear arrives in the Supermarket and tries to take over Evil Pea's freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isn't mean at all and just needed some good friends.

programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to Australia on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of why a group of kangaroos, and their joeys, are living on a beach. Along the way, Andy is chased by a pack of dingoes and hops to safety with the baby kangaroos.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 6

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 7

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s "jokes." Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his "comedian’s disease." Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder’s home realm.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their "creature awareness" message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip’s Music Store!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song "just for them", leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 61
programme.desc: When a god awful stench pours forth from the portal, Puss and company must deal with the vomit inducing consequences

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 62
programme.desc: A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: Iconic Australia S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: When you look back through Australia's history, social progress is almost always marked by the rebellious behaviour of larrikin Aussies who, through their charisma, authenticity and passionate determination created change.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Indulge in Lauren's exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: The Streets with Dan Hong S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Dan Hong sets out to unearth iconic national street food dishes, tracing them back to their roots and then preparing them himself.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 40
programme.desc: Australia's bumper harvest overshadowed by a surge in international grain production; Finding a balance between koalas and timber; Water politics in the Macquarie Marshes; and restoring community spirit in a tiny border town.

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 41
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel Gideon Haigh, Peter Lalor and Alexia Pesce discuss the lead up to the First Ashes Test in Perth, the opening week of the WBBL and the AFLW Finals._x000D_

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 39
programme.desc: It's the season finale of That Pacific Sports Show! Tiana Penitani Gray, Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tinirau Arona wrap up 2025 with highlights, special guests, and powerful Pasifika performances. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 229
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 229
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 229
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Derek starts his journey on the hunt for some duck, to help make an olive tapenade, head out on sea to collect ocean grown farmed abalone and even finds time to shake a leg with a local Noongar kids' dance group.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Thanh sets his focus on another classically Mediterranean vegetable - the artichoke. Along the way he follows the artichoke through Melbourne's largest wholesale produce market and into a local Italian kitchen. _x000D_

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces (2021) - EP 3
programme.desc: The gourmet chefs turned station cooks. In 2018 two retired chefs fulfilled their dream to cook for the hungry crew of an outback cattle station. But for staff used to plain food, there were a few changes needed to the menu.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: You can't win a cricket match without scoring a lot of runs, and a special breed of batsmen that did this better than anybody else. Richards, Gower, Haynes, Crowe, Miandad and Gavaskar were the legendary '80s master blasters.

programme.title: Restoration Australia S7 - EP 1
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a big city couple aiming to bring a slouching country town mansion back to the burnished glory of its gold rush years._x000D_

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 211
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien (2025) - EP 211
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Derek starts his journey on the hunt for some duck, to help make an olive tapenade, head out on sea to collect ocean grown farmed abalone and even finds time to shake a leg with a local Noongar kids' dance group.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Thanh sets his focus on another classically Mediterranean vegetable - the artichoke. Along the way he follows the artichoke through Melbourne's largest wholesale produce market and into a local Italian kitchen. _x000D_

programme.title: Fancy Fruit S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Have you eaten a persimmon? If you haven't, you're not alone. And it's a sometimes-misunderstood fruit. Where better to go to learn that a Queensland orchard celebrating a record crop.

programme.title: ABC National News (2025) - EP 321
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 (2025) - EP 181
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Red Centre S1 - EP 2

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Seth Meyers with guests Claire Danes and Callum Turner. (US TX: 13 Nov).

programme.title: CNBC On Assignment
programme.desc: Karen Tso presents highlights from CNBC’s coverage of the 2025 IMF and World Bank Group Annual Meetings in Washington DC where conversations focused on the global economy, the impact of geopolitical and trade uncertainty as well as well as the transformational potential of AI.

programme.title: CNBC Explains
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Jimmy Fallon with guests Ben Stiller and Brad Paisley, and standup by Peter Revello. (US TX: 12 Nov).

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Jimmy Fallon with guests Jonas Brothers, Matthew Rhys and A'ja Wilson, and standup by Fiona Cauley. (US TX: 13 Nov).

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: When financial fraudster Paul Kruse propositions his assistant’s teenage daughter, this angry mom gets revenge and him behind bars. But will this whistleblower survive Kruse’s sinister murder-for-hire plot?

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 1
programme.desc: The founder of the iconic lifestyle brand reveals how a challenging childhood shaped her entrepreneurial spirit, her journey overcoming cancer and anxiety, and why she’s still brimming with new business ideas.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 1
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 2
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 2

programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1

programme.title: Razor

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 44 (R)
programme.desc: Tei, devastated by a premature birth and the loss of her child, falls into poor health. Tsutaju, also dispirited, encounters a man named Sadakazu (Inoue Yoshio), who claims to be from Sunpu and asks to write a book at Koshodo. Sadakazu hands Tsutaju a Sagara kite, which he says was created by Gennai. Hearing this, Tsutaju shares the possibility of Gennai’s survival with Tei. As they begin to pursue the mystery surrounding Gennai, both gradually regain their strength and purpose.

programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Kawahara Takuya upcycles discarded jeans - his partner Yamasawa Ryoji buys old denim overseas by the tonne. These denim devotees together make it cooler than cool once again!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Food: Globalised Japanese Cuisine
programme.desc: There are nearly 190,000 Japanese-style restaurants around the world and 90 per cent are run by non-Japanese chefs - we look at how global cultures and trends are updating Japanese cuisine.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Many now rarely-seen crafts live on in the remote villages of the Kii Mountains - we see aged artisans producing pigment from pine tree soot and crafting traditional wooden buckets and tubs.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends

programme.title: u&i

programme.title: Little Charo

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Over 70 per cent of Japanese people are said to use eyeglasses - we visit Sabae in Fukui, where over 90 per cent of Japan's glasses are made, and explore Japanese eyewear history and new technology.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan

programme.desc: Today: fielding an urgent request on the phone. Dong Van Huu from Vietnam works at an architecture company - in a role play challenge, he fields a call about blueprints that are missing information.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Kawahara Takuya upcycles discarded jeans - his partner Yamasawa Ryoji buys old denim overseas by the tonne. These denim devotees together make it cooler than cool once again!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan

programme.title: Okinawa
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan - we examine its past and present with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: This episode of a series on COP30 in Brazil examines agroforestry, a combination of agriculture and forestry promoted by scientists as a potential method of regenerating rainforests.

programme.title: Natural Stone Walls
programme.desc: Shiga / Nagayama Yuko (Architect): A group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone for 400 years - Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilised.

programme.desc: We meet American Parker Allen, a Tokyo-based consultant who helps foreigners purchase vacant houses in Japan, and Argentinian-born Komatsu Graciela Ana, who runs a dairy farm in Shibetsu in Hokkaido.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 B.C. - we examine various aspects of Jomon society with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

programme.desc: We look at the Self-Defense Forces' disaster preparation, including their response team's special equipment and techniques and a new tsunami prediction system.

programme.desc: This live show invites various personalities, celebrity guests and experts to explore relationship challenges with unique perspectives and provocative questions, tailored to each episode's theme. Viewers join in the conversation through live chat rooms and voice calls.

programme.title: Destined - EP 22
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 23
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 39
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi (Luo Jin) conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang (Yin Fang) an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 13
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 8
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 3
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 27
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2082
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 9
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lau Yu-fan is caught. Lau Wai-ling is tied up and her organs are to be harvested alive. Fortunately, Chow Chun-kit saves the father and his daughter, who put their differences aside. And during the rescue mission, Chow Chun-kit discovers an arsenal. The incident is concluded.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 16
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 14
programme.desc: Chi-bun makes a love confession to Hiu-ling. Ho-yee is imprisoned for six weeks. Ko Tsun thinks he can help Ho-yee get off the hook as he locates Annie’s mother. Annie eventually disappears. Ho-yee decides to plead guilty. Ko Tsun finds out Ko Sing has leaked some secret. Ko Sing explains that he is repaying a favor.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 754

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 14
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 17
programme.desc: Wai-lik deduces that Siu-po colludes with some overseas suspect, so he asks Wing-sze to launch an investigation. Wing-sze discovers some clue. Wai-lik rushes to carry out an inspection. He keeps hearing gunshots and catches sight of Siu-po. He then finds out why Siu-po made a jailbreak. Although Wai-lik’s direction is incorrect, but he has sufficiently made up for his previous mistakes.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Chow Chun-kit recommends Cheung Kin-bong for promotion. And before the interview, he helps him practice and deal with interpersonal relationships. But Cheung Kin-bong eventually cannot cope, and he suggests it could have something to do with internal politics.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason.
